articles.title: Boria Majumdar likely to get two-year ban in Wriddhiman Saha case - The Indian Express
articles.description: Following his revelation, Saha received widespread support from the cricketing fraternity. Former India coach Ravi Shastri urged BCCI president Sourav Ganguly “to dive in”.
